info.title: Aletheia
info.description: Aletheia is an online web service providing financial data through an easily accessible HTTP REST API. Access stock data, SEC filings, Insider Trades, earnings calls, and more.

Symbol.description: The symbol that data was requested for
Symbol.title: Symbol

Name.description: The name of the issuing company
Name.title: Company Name

StockSymbol.description: The registered trading symbol of the security
StockSymbol.title: Stock Symbol

Price.description: The last trade price of the security
Price.title: Price

DollarChange.description: The change in price since the opening of today's trading session
DollarChange.title: Price Change

PercentChange.description: The change in price, expressed as a percentage, since the opening of today's trading session
PercentChange.title: Percent Change

PreviousClose.description: The closing price of the previous trading session
PreviousClose.title: Previous Close

Open.description: The opening price of this security at the opening of the trading session
Open.title: Open

BidPrice.description: The highest price a buyer will pay to buy the specified bid quantity number of shares
BidPrice.title: Bid Price

BidQuantity.description: The number of shares a buyer will pay to buy at the specified bid price
BidQuantity.title: Bid Quantity

AskPrice.description: The security price a market maker is willing to spend to purchase one share
AskPrice.title: Ask Price

AskQuantity.description: The amount of a security a market maker is willing to purchase at the given ask price
AskQuantity.title: Ask Quantity

DayRangeLow.description: The lowest price the security has been traded for during today's trading session
DayRangeLow.title: Day Low

DayRangeHigh.description: The highest price the security has been traded for during today's trading session
DayRangeHigh.title: Day High

YearRangeLow.description: The stock price low over the past 12 months (from summary data)
YearRangeLow.title: Year Low

YearRangeHigh.description: The stock price high over the past 12 months (from summary data)
YearRangeHigh.title: Year High

Volume.description: The number of shares that have been traded so far in the trading session
Volume.title: Volume

AverageVolume.description: The average number of shares that are traded in a given trading session (1 day)
AverageVolume.title: Average Volume

MarketCap.description: The market value of the organization's outstanding shares
MarketCap.title: Market Capitalization

Beta.description: The Beta of the stock. Beta reflects market volatility.
Beta.title: Beta

EarningsPerShare.description: The EPS of the most recent fiscal year
EarningsPerShare.title: Earnings Per Share

ForwardDividend.description: The anticipated total dividend payout over the next 12 months
ForwardDividend.title: Forward Dividend

ForwardDividendYield.description: The anticipated total dividend payout, as a percentage yield, over the next 12 months
ForwardDividendYield.title: Forward Dividend Yield

ExDividendDate.description: The latest date at which one must own the stock to be included in the next dividend payment
ExDividendDate.title: Ex-Dividend Date

YearTargetEstimate.description: The price target at which analysts are predicting the price of one share to be in 12 months time
YearTargetEstimate.title: Year Target Estimate

QueriedSymbol.description: The symbol corresponding to the summary data
QueriedSymbol.title: Queried Symbol (summary)

DataCollectedOn.description: The date and time stamp at which the summary data was collected
DataCollectedOn.title: Summary Data Collected On

FiscalYearEnds.description: The end of the company's fiscal year
FiscalYearEnds.title: Fiscal Year Ends

MostRecentQuarter.description: The end date of the most recent fiscal quarter
MostRecentQuarter.title: Most Recent Quarter

ProfitMargin.description: The profit margin in the most recent fiscal period
ProfitMargin.title: Profit Margin

OperatingMargin.description: The operating margin of the company in the most recent fiscal period
OperatingMargin.title: Operating Margin

ReturnOnAssets.description: Net income expressed as a percentage of assets
ReturnOnAssets.title: Return on Assets

ReturnOnEquity.description: Net income expressed as a percentage of equity
ReturnOnEquity.title: Return on Equity

Revenue.description: Revenue of the company in the most recent fiscal year
Revenue.title: Revenue

RevenuePerShare.description: Revenue per share in the most recent fiscal year
RevenuePerShare.title: Revenue Per Share

QuarterlyRevenueGrowth.description: The growth rate in quarterly revenue
QuarterlyRevenueGrowth.title: Quarterly Revenue Growth

GrossProfit.description: The profit a company makes after deducting the costs associated with providing services
GrossProfit.title: Gross Profit

EBITDA.description: Earnings before interest, tax, depreciation, and amortization
EBITDA.title: EBITDA

NetIncomeAvailableToCommon.description: The net earnings available to common shareholders (after tax and preferred dividends)
NetIncomeAvailableToCommon.title: Earnings available to Common

DilutedEps.description: Earnings per share on a diluted basis (if all convertible securities were converted to equity)
DilutedEps.title: Diluted EPS

QuarterlyEarningsGrowth.description: The growth rate in quarterly earnings
QuarterlyEarningsGrowth.title: Quarterly Earnings Growth

TotalCash.description: The total amount of cash the company has on hand
TotalCash.title: Total Cash

TotalCashPerShare.description: The total cash the company has on hand at a per-share basis
TotalCashPerShare.title: Total Cash Per Share

TotalDebt.description: The total debt of a company (liabilities)
TotalDebt.title: Total Debt

CurrentRatio.description: Ratio of current assets to current liabilities. Reflects short term liquidity.
CurrentRatio.title: Current Ratio

BookValuePerShare.description: Net equity on a per-share basis
BookValuePerShare.title: Book value per share

OperatingCashFlow.description: Net cash generated from or used by operating activities
OperatingCashFlow.title: Operating Cash Flow

LeveredFreeCashFlow.description: The remaining earnings after paying financial obligations
LeveredFreeCashFlow.title: Levered Free Cash Flow

Beta.description: The Beta of the stock. Beta reflects market volatility.
Beta.title: Beta

YearChange.description: The percent change in the stock price over the past 12 month period
YearChange.title: Year Change

SP500YearChange.description: The trailing 12 month return of the S&P 500 (for comparison purposes)
SP500YearChange.title: S&P 500 Return

YearHigh.description: The stock price high over the past 12 months (from statistics data)
YearHigh.title: Year High

YearLow.description: The stock price low over the past 12 months (from statistics data)
YearLow.title: Year Low

MovingAverage50Day.description: The average share price over the past 50 days
MovingAverage50Day.title: 50 Day Moving Average

MovingAverage200Day.description: The average share price over the past 200 days
MovingAverage200Day.title: 200 Day Moving Average

AverageVolume3Month.description: The average volume of the last 90 days
AverageVolume3Month.title: Average Volume - 90 Days

AverageVolume10Day.description: The average volume of the past ten days
AverageVolume10Day.title: Average Volume - 10 Day

SharesOutstanding.description: The number of shares available for trade in the market
SharesOutstanding.title: Shares Outstanding

Float.description: The number of shares being traded in the market
Float.title: Float

PercentHeldByInsiders.description: The percentage of shares held by insiders at the company
PercentHeldByInsiders.title: Percent Held by Insiders

PercentHeldByInstitutions.description: The percentage of shares held by institutions
PercentHeldByInstitutions.title: Percent Held by Institutions

SharesShort.description: The number of shares currently under short sale
SharesShort.title: Shares Short

ShortRatio.description: The number of days it takes short sellers on average to cover their positions
ShortRatio.title: Short Ratio

ShortPercentOfFloat.description: The percentage of shares (float) that are currently being shorted
ShortPercentOfFloat.title: Short Percent of Float

ShortPercentOfSharesOutstanding.description: The percentage of shares outstanding that are currently being shorted
ShortPercentOfSharesOutstanding.title: Short Percent of Shares Outstanding

ForwardAnnualDividend.description: The projected dividend of one share over the next 12 months
ForwardAnnualDividend.title: Forward Annual Dividend

ForwardAnnualDividendYield.description: The projected dividend yield of one share over the next 12 months at the current share price
ForwardAnnualDividendYield.title: Forward Annual Dividend Yield

TrailingAnnualDividend.description: Sum of the paid dividends over the past 12 months
TrailingAnnualDividend.title: Trailing Annual Dividend

TrailingAnnualDividendYield.description: Sum of the paid dividends over the past 12 months, expressed as a yield
TrailingAnnualDividendYield.title: Trailing Annual Dividend Yield

FiveYearAverageDividendYield.description: The average dividend yield over the past five years
FiveYearAverageDividendYield.title: Average Dividend Yield - 5 Year

DividendPayoutRatio.description: The proportion of earnings a company is paying out as dividends, expressed as a percentage
DividendPayoutRatio.title: Dividend Payout Ratio

DividendDate.description: The dividend payment date (if a dividend is offered)
DividendDate.title: Dividend Date

ExDividendDate.description: The latest date at which one must own the stock to be included in the next dividend payment
ExDividendDate.title: Ex-dividend Date

LastSplitFactor.description: The factor by which the stock was split at the last split
LastSplitFactor.title: Last Split Factor

LastSplitDate.description: The last time the stock was split or reverse split
LastSplitDate.title: Last Split Date

QueriedSymbol.description: The symbol corresponding to the statistics data
QueriedSymbol.title: Queried Symbol (statistics)

DataCollectedOn.description: The specific date and time the statistical data was colllected
DataCollectedOn.title: Statistical data collected

get.description: Access stock data for any US-based publicly traded equity security

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The trading symbol of the security

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: Includes summary data like price, volume, open, and more

parameters.name: statistics
parameters.description: Includes data like current ratio, moving averages, and more

InteractiveDataUrl.description: If the filing includes XBRL information (for example, 10-K filings), a link to the interactive data of the filing
InteractiveDataUrl.title: Interactive Data URL

Filing.description: The filing type, for example "10-K" or "10-Q"
Filing.title: Filing Type

DocumentsUrl.description: A URL to the filing with the SEC
DocumentsUrl.title: Filing URL

FilingDate.description: The date the filing was filed with the SEC
FilingDate.title: Filing Date

get.description: Request a list of latest SEC filings for an entity (company or person)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The CIK or trading symbol of the entity you are requesting filings for

parameters.name: filing
parameters.description: Filter to a specific filing type, for example "10-K" or "10-Q"

parameters.name: before
parameters.x-ms-summary: Filter to filings only before a particular date in time
parameters.description: YYYYMMDD format, for example 20151231

SchemaVersion.description: The schema version of the data document
SchemaVersion.title: Schema Version

PeriodOfReport.description: The date at which the document was prepared and reported
PeriodOfReport.title: Period of Report

DocumentType.description: The document type of this statement (i.e. "4", "3", "5")
DocumentType.title: Document Type

IssuerCik.description: The issuing company's CIK (identification number) that has been assigned by the SEC
IssuerCik.title: Issuer CIK

IssuerName.description: The name of the issuing company involved in this transaction
IssuerName.title: Issuer Name

IssuerTradingSymbol.description: The trading symbol of the issuing company involved in this transaction
IssuerTradingSymbol.title: Issuer Trading Symbol

OwnerCik.description: The owner's CIK (identification number) that has been assigned by the SEC
OwnerCik.title: Owner CIK

OwnerStateCode.description: The owner's state code, i.e. "FL" or "GA"
OwnerStateCode.title: Owner Address State Code

OwnerZipCode.description: The zip code of the owner's address
OwnerZipCode.title: Owner Zip Code

OwnerIsOfficer.description: If the owner is specified as an officer of the issuing company
OwnerIsOfficer.title: Owner is Officer

OwnerOfficerTitle.description: If the owner is a titled officer, their position title
OwnerOfficerTitle.title: Owner Officer Title

SecurityTitle.description: The title of the non-derivative security involved in the transaction
SecurityTitle.title: Security Title (Non-Derivative)

SecuritiesOwnedFollowingTransaction.description: The number of non-derivative securities the filing owner owns following the transaction
SecuritiesOwnedFollowingTransaction.title: Securities Owned Following Transaction (Non-Derivative)

DirectOrIndirectOwnership.description: The ownership nature of the security. 0 = Direct, 1 = Indirect
DirectOrIndirectOwnership.title: Direct or Indirect Ownership (Non-Derivative)

TransactionDate.description: The date of the non-derivative transaction
TransactionDate.title: Transaction Date (Non-Derivative)

TransactionCode.description: The ID of the transaction code for this non-derivative transaction
TransactionCode.title: Transaction Code (Non-Derivative)

TransactionQuantity.description: The number of securities in the non-derivative transaction (number of shares)
TransactionQuantity.title: Transaction Quantity (Non-Derivative)

ConversionOrExercisePrice.description: The exercise price of this derivative security
ConversionOrExercisePrice.title: Conversion or Exercise Price

Exersisable.description: The date this derivative security is exercisable by the owner
Exersisable.title: Exercisable On

Expiration.description: The expiration date of the derivative security involved in this transaction
Expiration.title: Expiration Date

UnderlyingSecurityTitle.description: The title of the derivative security's underlying equity security
UnderlyingSecurityTitle.title: Underlying Security Title

UnderlyingSecurityQuantity.description: The quantity of the underlying securities in this derivative transaction
UnderlyingSecurityQuantity.title: Underlying Security Quantity

SecurityTitle.description: The title of the derivative security involved in the transaction
SecurityTitle.title: Security Title (Derivative)

SecuritiesOwnedFollowingTransaction.description: The number of derivative securities the filing owner owns following the transaction
SecuritiesOwnedFollowingTransaction.title: Securities Owned Following Transaction (Derivative)

DirectOrIndirectOwnership.description: The ownership nature of the security. 0 = Direct, 1 = Indirect
DirectOrIndirectOwnership.title: Direct or Indirect Ownership (Derivative)

TransactionDate.description: The date of this derivative transaction
TransactionDate.title: Transaction Date (Derivative)

TransactionCode.description: The ID of the transaction code for this non-derivative transaction
TransactionCode.title: Transaction Code (Derivative)

TransactionQuantity.description: The number of securities involved in this derivative transaction
TransactionQuantity.title: Transaction Quantity (Derivative)

TransactionPricePerSecurity.description: The price per derivative security in this transaction
TransactionPricePerSecurity.title: Transaction Price per Security (Derivative)

get.description: Parse a Form 4 (changes in ownership) document

parameters.name: filingurl
parameters.description: The URL to the form 4 SEC Filing

PeriodStart.description: The start date of this fiscal period
PeriodStart.title: Period Start

PeriodEnd.description: The end date of this fiscal period
PeriodEnd.title: Period End

Revenue.description: The company's revenue in the fiscal period
Revenue.title: Revenue

SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The summation of SG&A expenses in the fiscal period
SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.title: Selling, General, and Administrative Expenses

ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.description: The R&D expenses in the fiscal period
ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.title: Research and Development Expenses

OperatingIncome.description: The operating income or loss of the company on the income statement
OperatingIncome.title: Operating Income

NetIncome.description: The net income or loss in this fiscal period
NetIncome.title: Net Income

Assets.description: The summation of assets on the balance sheet
Assets.title: Assets

Liabilities.description: The summation of liabilities on the balance sheet
Liabilities.title: Liabilities

Equity.description: The summation of equity on the balance sheet
Equity.title: Equity

Cash.description: The cash on the balance sheet
Cash.title: Cash

CurrentAssets.description: The summation of current assets on the balance sheet (assets that will be disposed of within 12 months)
CurrentAssets.title: Current Assets

CurrentLiabilities.description: The summation of current liabilities on the balance sheet (liabilities that will be settled within 12 months)
CurrentLiabilities.title: Current Liabilities

RetainedEarnings.description: The balance of retained earnings or retained deficit at the end of the fiscal period
RetainedEarnings.title: Retained Earnings

OperatingCashFlows.description: Cash flows generated from or used by operating activities (i.e. payments to suppliers)
OperatingCashFlows.title: Operating Cash Flows

InvestingCashFlows.description: Cash flows generated from or used by investing activities (i.e. purchases of assets)
InvestingCashFlows.title: Investing Cash Flows

FinancingCashFlows.description: Cash flows generated from or used by financing activities (i.e. payment/issuance of debt)
FinancingCashFlows.title: Financing Cash Flows

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash gained from issuances of debt in the fiscal period
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.title: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt

PaymentsOfDebt.description: The total payments of debt the company made in this fiscal period
PaymentsOfDebt.title: Payments of Debt

DividendsPaid.description: The total dividends paid out during this fiscal period
DividendsPaid.title: Dividends Paid

get.description: Open financial statements from a 10-K or 10-Q filing

parameters.name: filingurl
parameters.description: The URL to the SEC 10-K or 10-Q filing

Cik.description: The unique ID of the entity as assigned by the SEC
Cik.title: CIK

Name.title: The name of the entity (company name or person's full name)

TradingSymbol.description: If the entity is a company, the company's trading symbol from a public stock exchange
TradingSymbol.title: Trading Symbol

get.description: Search the Aletheia database for an entity. An entity represents either a company (serving as an security issuer) or a person (serving as a security owner).

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: The search term (i.e. company or person name).

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Limit the search results

Cik.description: The unique identifier of the entity assigned by the SEC
Cik.title: CIK

Name.description: The name of the entity (company name or person's full name)
Name.title: Name

TradingSymbol.description: If the entity is a company, the trading symbol of the company's equity securities on a stock exchange
TradingSymbol.title: Trading Symbol

get.description: Get information about an entity like CIK, name, and trading symbol

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Either the CIK or trading symbol of the entity

Id.description: The Aletheia-assigned unique ID for this filing in our database
Id.title: ID

FilingUrl.description: The URL to the filing with the SEC
FilingUrl.title: Filing URL

AccessionP1.description: The first portion of the SEC-assigned unique ID for this filing
AccessionP1.title: Accession Number Part 1

AccessionP2.description: The second portion of the SEC-assigned unique ID for this filing
AccessionP2.title: Accession Number Part 2

AccessionP3.description: The third portion of the SEC-assigned unique ID for this filing
AccessionP3.title: Accession Number Part 3

FilingType.description: The Filing Type ID for this filing
FilingType.title: Filing Type

ReportedOn.description: The date this filing was filed with the SEC
ReportedOn.title: Reported On

Issuer.description: The CIK of the issuing company
Issuer.title: Issuer CIK

get.description: Get details of a particular SEC filing that has already been processed by Aletheia systems

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Aletheia-assigned unique ID of the filing

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the filing with the SEC

Id.description: The ID of the transaction in the Aletheia database
Id.title: Transaction ID

FromFiling.description: The ID of the filing from which this transaction originated from
FromFiling.title: From Filing (ID)

Id.description: The ID of the filing from which the transaction originated from
Id.title: Filing ID

FilingUrl.description: The URL of filing form which the transaction originated from
FilingUrl.title: Filing URL

AccessionP1.description: The first portion of the SEC-assigned unique ID for this filing
AccessionP1.title: Accession Number Part 1

AccessionP2.description: The second portion of the SEC-assigned unique ID for this filing
AccessionP2.title: Accession Number Part 2

AccessionP3.description: The third portion of the SEC-assigned unique ID for this filing
AccessionP3.title: Accession Number Part 3

FilingType.description: The type of filing the transaction originated from (i.e. "4")
FilingType.title: Filing Type

ReportedOn.description: The date on which the originating filing was filed with the SEC
ReportedOn.title: Reported On

Issuer.description: The CIK of the company that issued the securities involved in this transaction
Issuer.title: Issuer CIK

Cik.description: The CIK of the company that issued the securities involved in this transaction
Cik.title: Issuer CIK

Name.description: The name of the issuing company
Name.title: Issuer Name

TradingSymbol.description: The trading symbol of the issuing company
TradingSymbol.title: Issuer Trading Symbol

Owner.description: The CIK of the owner (insider) involved in this transaction
Owner.title: Owner CIK

Cik.description: The CIK of the owner involved in this transaction
Cik.title: Owner CIK

Name.description: The name of the owner involved in this transaction
Name.title: Owner Name

TradingSymbol.description: The trading symbol of the owner (if it is a company)
TradingSymbol.title: Trading Symbol

EntryType.description: 0 = A new transaction, 1 = Reporting a holding
EntryType.title: Entry Type

QuantityOwnedFollowingTransaction.description: The number of securities of this type owned after the transaction
QuantityOwnedFollowingTransaction.title: Quantity Owned Following Transaction

DirectIndirect.description: The ownership nature of the security. 0 = Direct, 1 = Indirect
DirectIndirect.title: Direct or Indirect Ownership

SecurityTitle.description: The title of the subject security in this transaction or holding record
SecurityTitle.title: Security Title

SecurityType.description: The type of security. 0 = equity, 1 = derivative
SecurityType.title: Security Type

AcquiredDisposed.description: Whether it was an acquisition or disposition. 0 = Acquisition, 1 = Disposition
AcquiredDisposed.title: Acquired or Disposed

Quantity.description: The number of securities involved in this transaction or holding
Quantity.title: Quantity

PricePerSecurity.description: The price at which the security was acquired or disposed
PricePerSecurity.title: Price per Security

TransactionDate.description: The effective date of the transaction
TransactionDate.title: Transaction Date

TransactionCode.description: Code representing the type of transaction
TransactionCode.title: Transaction Code

ConversionOrExercisePrice.description: The exercise price of this derivative security
ConversionOrExercisePrice.title: Conversion or Exercise Price

ExercisableDate.description: The exercisable date of the derivative security
ExercisableDate.title: Exercisable Date

ExpirationDate.description: The expiration date of the derivative security
ExpirationDate.title: Expiration Date

UnderlyingSecurityTitle.description: If the transaction is derivative, the title of the underlying security
UnderlyingSecurityTitle.title: Underlying Security Title

UnderlyingSecurityQuantity.description: If the transaction is derivative, the quantity of the underlying security
UnderlyingSecurityQuantity.title: Underlying Security Quantity

get.description: Get the latest insider transactions for a person or company

parameters.name: issuer
parameters.description: The CIK or trading symbol of the issuing company

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The CIK of the owner (person) involved as the owner in transactions

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The number of transactions to limit the search to. Default is 20.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Filter transactions to before a particular date (YYYYMMDD format)

parameters.name: securitytype
parameters.description: Filter to a security type. 0 = Equity, 1 = Derivative

parameters.name: transactiontype
parameters.description: Filter to a particular transaction type

parameters.name: cascade
parameters.description: Also include related records (entity and filing data)

Cik.description: The SEC-assigned CIK (ID) of this owner
Cik.title: CIK

Name.description: The full name of the owner
Name.title: Name

get.description: List the owners who in the past have had transactions with a particular company's securities

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Either the CIK or the trading symbol of the company you are requesting. Provide the CIK for faster performance.

delete.description: Used internally to unsubscribe callback URL's from the new filings webhook

EntityTitle.description: The title of the entity (company or person name)
EntityTitle.title: Entity Title

EntityCik.description: The SEC-assigned CIK (ID) of the entity of which the filing corresponds to
EntityCik.title: Entity CIK

DocumentsUrl.description: A URL to the filing with the SEC
DocumentsUrl.title: Documents URL

FilingDate.description: The date the filing was filed with the SEC
FilingDate.title: Filing Date

post.summary: When a new filing is filed with the SEC
post.description: Trigger a workflow when a new filing is filed with the SEC and use details from that filing

RetainedEarnings.description: The historically (since inception) cumulative amount of net income left over for the business after it has paid out dividends to its shareholders
RetainedEarnings.title: Retained Earnings

OperatingIncome.description: Profit or loss from the company's operations directly related to their core business
OperatingIncome.title: Operating Income

Revenue.description: Income generated from normal business operations minus discounts and deductions for returned merchandise
Revenue.title: Revenue

SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: Sum of all direct and indirect selling expenses and all general and administrative expenses (G&A) of the company
SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.title: Selling, General, and Administrative Expenses

ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.description: Sum of money spent on activities that the company undertook to innovate and introduce new products and services
ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.title: Research and Development Expense

Assets.description: The sum of total Assets on the company's balance sheet
Assets.title: Assets

NetIncome.description: The company's bottom line profit or loss. Defined as sales minus cost of goods sold, selling, general and administrative expenses, operating expenses, depreciation, interest, taxes, and other expenses
NetIncome.title: Net Income

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The amount of cash the company received from issuing debt in the fiscal period
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.title: Proceeds from Debt Issuance

OperatingCashFlows.description: Net flow of cash from the past fiscal period involving transactions related to operations
OperatingCashFlows.title: Operating Cash Flows

CurrentLiabilities.description: The liabilities that are intended to be settled within 12 months
CurrentLiabilities.title: Current Liabilities

Equity.description: The equity (assets minus liabilities) on the company's balance sheet
Equity.title: Equity

DividendsPaid.description: The payments of common stock dividends in the past fiscal period
DividendsPaid.title: Dividends Paid

Liabilities.description: The sum of total Liabilities on the company's balance sheet
Liabilities.title: Liabilities

CommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: The number of common stock shares outstanding
CommonStockSharesOutstanding.title: Common Stock Shares Outstanding

CurrentAssets.description: The assets that are intended to be disposed of within 12 months
CurrentAssets.title: Current Assets

InvestingCashFlows.description: Net flow of cash from the past fiscal period involving cash generated from or spent related to investing activities
InvestingCashFlows.title: Investing Cash Flows

FinancingCashFlows.description: Net flow of cash from the past fiscal period involving transactions related to debt, equity, or dividends
FinancingCashFlows.title: Financing Cash Flows

Cash.description: Balance of cash on the company's balance sheet
Cash.title: Cash

get.description: Access a set of financial statements for any publicly traded company in simple form

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The CIK or trading symbol of the entity you are requesting filings for

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: 0 = Annual results, 1 = Quarterly results

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Before date
parameters.x-ms-summary: Get the most recent financial statements before this date YYYYMMDD format.

PeriodStart.description: Period start date for this data point
PeriodStart.title: Period Start

PeriodEnd.description: Period end date for this data point
PeriodEnd.title: Period End

get.description: Examine the trend in a fundamental financial data point. For example, get all annual revenue since 2013 for Apple

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The CIK or trading symbol of the entity you are requesting filings for

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: The data fact you are trying to see. See https://aletheiaapi.com/api/#ep_FinancialFactTrend for the available fact list.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: 0 = Annual results only, 1 = quarterly results only

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Filter facts to only after a specific date. YYYYMMDD format.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Filter facts to only before a specific date. YYYYMMDD format.

Cik.description: The Central Index Key (SEC-assigned ID) of the company or person
Cik.title: CIK

Name.description: Name of the person or company
Name.title: Name

TradingSymbol.description: If this entity is a publicly traded company, the trading symbol of this company
TradingSymbol.title: Trading Symbol

Id.description: The unique ID of this SEC filing
Id.title: Id

FilingUrl.description: The direct URL to this filing with the SEC
FilingUrl.title: Filing URL

AccessionP1.description: The first portion of the 3-part accession number (SEC-assigned unique ID of this filing)
AccessionP1.title: Accession Number Part 1

AccessionP2.description: The second portion of the 3-part accession number (SEC-assigned unique ID of this filing)
AccessionP2.title: Accession Number Part 2

AccessionP3.description: The third portion of the 3-part accession number (SEC-assigned unique ID of this filing)
AccessionP3.title: Accession Number Part 3

ReportedOn.description: The date this transaction was reported to the SEC
ReportedOn.title: Reported On

Issuer.description: The Central Index Key of the issuer (company) in this filing
Issuer.title: Issuer CIK

Owner.description: The Central Index Key of the owner (insider) in this transaction
Owner.title: Owner CIK

Id.description: Unique ID of this held officer position
Id.title: Held Officer Position ID

Officer.description: The CIK of the officer (individual) that this position pertains to
Officer.title: Officer CIK

Company.description: The CIK of the company that this title pertains to
Company.title: Company CIK

PositionTitle.description: The title of the named position
PositionTitle.title: Position Title

ObservedOn.description: The unique ID of the SEC filing this position was reported on
ObservedOn.title: Observed On

Id.description: The unique ID of this reported security transaction or holding
Id.title: Id

FromFiling.description: The unique ID of the SEC filing this transaction originated from (should be included in the body)
FromFiling.title: From Filing

EntryType.description: 0 = A new transaction (acquisition or disposition), 1 = the insider is just reporting ownership, not a change in ownership
EntryType.title: Entry Type

QuantityOwnedFollowingTransaction.description: The number of securities that the insider owns following this reported transaction
QuantityOwnedFollowingTransaction.title: Quantity Owned Following Transaction

DirectIndirect.description: 0 = The owner owns this security directly, 1 = indirect ownership
DirectIndirect.title: Direct Indirect

SecurityTitle.description: The title of the security being acquired, disposed of, or held
SecurityTitle.title: Security Title

Quantity.description: The quantity of securities that were acquired, disposed of, or reported
Quantity.title: Quantity

PricePerSecurity.description: The acquisition or disposition price of the security
PricePerSecurity.title: Price per security

TransactionDate.description: The date this transaction occurred on
TransactionDate.title: Transaction Date

TransactionCode.description: Specifies the transaction that took place. See http://aletheiaapi.com/docs/#insider-trading-webhook for the list of transaction codes
TransactionCode.title: Transaction Code

ConversionOrExercisePrice.description: If this security is a derivative, the conversion or exercise price
ConversionOrExercisePrice.title: Conversion or Exercise Price

ExercisableDate.description: If this security is a derivative, the date at which the contract is exercisable
ExercisableDate.title: Exercisable Date

ExpirationDate.description: If this security is a derivative, the date at which the security expires
ExpirationDate.title: Expiration Date

UnderlyingSecurityTitle.description: If this security is a derivative, the title of the underlying security the derivative is based on
UnderlyingSecurityTitle.title: Underlying Security Title

UnderlyingSecurityQuantity.description: If this is a derivative security, the quantity in the underlying contract
UnderlyingSecurityQuantity.title: Underlying Security Quantity

post.summary: When a new insider trade is reported to the SEC
post.description: Company insiders are required to report their security transactions to the SEC. Be notified within seconds of a new insider transaction in any particular company.

issuer.description: The issuing company of the securities being traded. For example, Microsoft or Apple. You must provide the CIK (ID) of the company. You can find the company ID with the 'Search Entities' action.
issuer.title: Company

owner.description: The CIK of the insider that is trading the securities. For example, the CEO of the company. You must provide the CIK (ID) of the person. You can find the ID for any particular insider with the 'Search Entities' action.
owner.title: Owner

transactionType.description: Filter to only a specific transaction type, i.e. buys, sells, grants, etc. See http://aletheiaapi.com/docs/#insider-trading-webhook for the list of available transaction type codes.
transactionType.title: Transaction Type

securityType.description: Filter to only a specific security type. 0 = non-derivative, 1 = derivative
securityType.title: Security Type

delete.description: Unsubscribe your endpoint from an Aletheia webhook
